content: --स्नानं (lit) bathing of an elephant; (<ab>fig.</ab>) useless or unproductive efforts resembling the ablution of elephants which, after pouring water over their bodies, end by throwing dirt, rubbish, and other foul matter; <ab>cf.</ab> अवशेंद्रियचित्तानां हस्तिस्नानमिव क्रिया <ls>H. 1. 18.</ls>
